name: TEMPLE GROOVE
description:
A small game made during "Hacker Games", a local hackathon in Vilnius, Lithuania.

STORY

  "In the darkness of the groovy temple a lone adventurer has lost his way, yet the mighty laser saved the day!"

GAMEPLAY

Use the mouse to navigate the laser through the dark temple in order to find the way out.

TEAM

Programming:  D. Simaitis, M, Krupauskas, A. Trakas, J. Migonis

Design: P. Jankunas

Soundtrack: I. Ceponis
